General.Name: Rudrabhishek Enterprises Limited
General.Description: Rudrabhishek Enterprises Limited operates as an integrated urban development and infrastructure consultant in India. The company offers viability analysis, infrastructure, urban planning, building design, structural engineering design, services design, building information modelling, project management consultancy services, as well as geographic information systems. It also provides RERA advisory and marketing consultancy services for real estate projects. The company undertakes projects in smart city, urban plans and GIS, water management, hi-tech cities, residential, commercial and industrial, hospitality and education, sports infra, project management consultancy, RERA, and other projects. Rudrabhishek Enterprises Limited was incorporated in 1992 and is based in New Delhi, India.
General.Address: Office No: 820, Antriksha Bhawan, New Delhi, India, 110001
